H0.text: Filtration is the most effective process for separating sodium chloride from a saltwater solution.

H1.text: Evaporation is the most effective process for separating sodium chloride from a saltwater solution.

H2.text: Magnetic separation is the most effective process for separating sodium chloride from a saltwater solution.

H3.text: Chemical separation is the most effective process for separating sodium chloride from a saltwater solution.
